problem_statement: Create a simple Python script called 'hello_atlasforge.py' in the workspace directory that prints 'Hello from AtlasForge!' to the console. The script should also print the current date and time. This is a sample mission to verify your AtlasForge installation is working correctly.
success_criteria: hello_atlasforge.py exists in the workspace directory
Running the script prints 'Hello from AtlasForge!'
The script prints the current date and time
No errors occur when running the script
